message.body: After a coaching session with Steve Staum a few days ago, Dad is leading a minyan service for the 1st time tonite at the Wasserman home. [See Mom kvell ;) ] We'll text you later when we're home & settled. Love u. x
Remember to use speakers or 1 side of earbuds--never both. Don't mix drivin' and groovin'. Gotta hear the road.
Za- just sent u v important info via email. Pls read now. Might send another re: addl traffic resources if I find any. Love u so!
Baltimore area: WBAL 1090 AM All news; traffic on the 5's (3:15, 3:25, etc). Don't know breadth of coverage or signal strength--could cover most of route or just a chunk.
KYW 1060 Philly has traffic on the 2's
Wilmington, DE area: WDEL 1150AM. Traffic on the 9's. Remember: these stations may not do traffic & weather q 10 mins. if not "drive time" or if Talk or Paid ad programming.
Pls txt on arrival both days. Th<x3.
Yay! Now tell Ms. G. we say hey, go get some good sleep and enjoy tomorrow! Oh, and don't forget to wear ur big girl panties--it should be an amazing day! ;D
Hey, r u back at HC?? If so, call me
Still in Bethesda, staying til tomorrow. Still want me to call?
Yah--If ya wanna jes' talk about thuh weather or sumthin. ~8b Like didja do anythin' unUsual tday??? Now, or...Dad's at Rachel's for another shiva: R'Michele's dad died. Probly home by 10. <x3
Great! Thx for letting us know. Snowing lots here...we're getting yours.... <x3

If so, they're at least 6-8 yrs old. The 1st batch I got was from a bicyclists' goods site. The last, I think, was from Lip Ivo; that info is being protected by our 3-headed dog, the hp CPU. If u find resource, pls get me 2 aloes. They had plain & aloe at the time. BTW, if ur drinking enough fluids, ul minimize the dry lips issue; it's usually a 1° sx of dehydration.
